title: How to Make Andhra Pasarettu at Home

steps.headline: Clean the lentils by removing the stones and pebbles.
Wash it under the running water.
Soak them for more than 12 hours or so.
Add lentils and green chilies in the mixer grinder.
Add the paste in a bowl.
Take some batter in a ladle.
Spread it on the dosa pan.
Press them lightly with the spatula.
Alternatively mix onions, fresh coriander leaves, ginger pieces and chilies.
Add the batter on the dosa pan.
Spread it on the pan with the spatula.
Reverse and roast it on the other side.
Serve it with Andhra Ginger or coconut chutney.

text: Clean the lentils by removing the stones and pebbles.  Wash it under the running water.  Soak them for more than 12 hours or so.  Discard the water.  Add lentils and green chilies in the mixer grinder.  Add salt.  Add ginger.  Add water.  Grind into a fine paste.  Add the paste in a bowl.  Heat a dosa pan.  Take some batter in a ladle.  Spread it on the dosa pan.  Add oil around the Pasarettu.  Sprinkle chopped onions.  Sprinkle chopped green chilies.  Sprinkle chopped ginger.  Sprinkle chopped fresh coriander leaves.  Press them lightly with the spatula.  Lift it with a spatula.  Turn it to other side.  Lift half of it.  Fold it into half.  Place it on a plate.  Alternatively mix onions, fresh coriander leaves, ginger pieces and chilies.  Add the batter on the dosa pan.  Spread it on the pan with the spatula.  Add oil around it.  Reverse and roast it on the other side.  Fold it into half.  Place it on the plate.  Serve it with Andhra Ginger or coconut chutney.
